column4: is anybody else having problems getting Intel PRO/Wireless 3945ABG working on "latest" 7.10?
no problems with it, in a Thinkpad T60
I got it to work a few times, but now I've tried pretty much all the stuff I can think of - to no avail
I'm running WPA2/TKIP... are you also using encryption, and if so, WPA2 as well?
